clauses.title: Private messages can be read
clauses.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.
clauses.clause_text: You should be aware that, when you submit your content or disclose information about yourself in on Gfycat’s fun pages, blogs, private messages, and community forums, the Site will collect the information you provide in such submissions, including any Personal Information.

case.text: Private messages can be read

clauses.title: App required for this service requires broad device permissions
clauses.description: The app of the service requires more device permissions than necessary. As a consequence it can compromise your privacy by accessing many functions and information from your device, such as precise location, contacts, device identifiers etc.
clauses.clause_text:
Gfycat will collect certain information that your mobile device sends when you use such Services, like a device identifier, user settings, location information, mobile carrier, and the operating system of your device.
Mobile versions of Gfycat’s Services may require that users log in with an account.
In such cases, information about use of mobile versions of the Services may be associated with accounts.
In addition, Gfycat may enable Individuals to download an application, widget, or other tool that can be used on mobile or other computing devices.
Some of these tools may store information on mobile or other devices.
These tools may transmit Personal Information to Gfycat to enable Individuals to access accounts and to enable Gfycat to track use of these tools.
Some of these tools may enable users to email reports and other information from the tool.

case.text: App required for this service requires broad device permissions

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text: We, as well as Third-Parties that provide content, advertising, or other functionality on our Services, may use cookies, pixel tags, local storage, and other technologies (“Technologies”) to automatically collect information through the Services.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations
clauses.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)
clauses.clause_text:
Data Retention

Gfycat retains the Personal Information we receive as described in this Privacy Policy for as long as you use our Services or as necessary to fulfill the purpose(s) for which it was collected, provide our Services, resolve disputes, establish legal defenses, conduct audits, pursue legitimate business purposes, enforce our agreements, and comply with applicable laws.

case.text: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations

clauses.title: The service may sell your data unless you opt out
clauses.description: There is a form to opt-out (typically California's CCPA) of the selling of your personal data. This is a bad a point because there are many services that don't have this form due to not selling your data in the first place.
clauses.clause_text: You may also have a right to request restriction of or object to processing of your Personal Information where such requests are permitted by law, and may opt out of our “sale” of data to third parties, as the term “sale” is defined under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).

case.text: Your Personal data may be sold unless you opt out

clauses.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

clauses.clause_text: transferable, sublicensable,

case.text: Your content can be licensed to third parties

clauses.title: You waive your right to a class action.
clauses.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that, by entering into this Terms of Service, you and Gfycat are each waiving the right to a trial by jury or to participate in a class action.

case.text: You waive your right to a class action.

clauses.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.
clauses.clause_text: You agree that any and all disputes or claims that have arisen or may arise between you and Gfycat, whether relating to these Terms of Service (including any alleged breach thereof), the Services, any advertising, any aspect of the relationship between us, or otherwise, shall be resolved exclusively through final and binding arbitration, rather than a court in accordance with the terms of this Arbitration Agreement, except that you may assert individual claims in small claims court, if your claims qualify.

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text: We may access, preserve, and disclose your Personal Information, other account information, and content if we believe doing so is required or appropriate to: (i) comply with law enforcement or national security requests and legal process, such as a court order or subpoena. (ii) respond to your requests. (iii) protect yours’, ours’ or others’ rights, property, or safety. (iv) to enforce Gfycat policies or contracts. (v) to collect amounts owed to Gfycat. (vi) when we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to prevent physical harm or financial loss or in connection with an investigation or prosecution of suspected or actual illegal activity. or (vii) if we, in good faith, believe that disclosure is otherwise necessary or advisable.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.clause_text: On 2024-06-06 04:30:16 UTC, markpapi (29422) Suspended wrote: Comprare patente a Roma originale ,Patente di guida online un atto di mentalità aperta Perché preoccuparsi quando il facile è il migliore? La patente di guida, soprattutto in Italia, richiede una procedura molto complessa per ottenerla. Tuttavia, questo documento è molto importante, forse anche più importante del passaporto o della carta d’identità, perché ti dà il diritto inalienabile di viaggiare in auto nella maggior parte dei paesi. https://www.patentediguida-it.org/ottenere-patente-a-palermo/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/acquista-patente-online-a-genova/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/acquista-la-patente-bologna/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/comprare-la-patente-a-catania/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/patente-lazio-senza-esame/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/patente-inter-senza-esame/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/patente-verona-senza-esame/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/ottenere-la-patente-europea/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/comprare-la-patente-venezia/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/comprare-patente-a-messina/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/comprare-patente-a-padova/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/acquista-patente-trieste-senza-esame/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/patente-online-brescia-senza-esame/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/acquista-parma-patente-senza-teoria/ https://www.patentediguida-it.org/patente-rinnovare-a-taranto/ Patente originale senza esame a Andria Rinnovo patente originale a Arezzo Come ottenere la patente a Udine Ottenere facile patente a Cesena Acquista patente gratuito Pesaro Patente Lecce veloce online

clauses.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
clauses.clause_text:
“Do Not Track”

Do Not Track (“DNT”) is a privacy preference that users can set in certain web browsers. DNT is a way for users to inform websites and services that they do not want certain information about their webpage visits collected over time and across websites or online services. Please note that we do not respond to or honor DNT signals or similar mechanisms transmitted by web browsers.

case.text: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
